评论概述: This is your sign to buy it.
评论详情: I am 5'3", 180 lbs, with a G-sized chest. I struggle hard with finding clothes that are both modest and don't make me look frumpy. GET THIS JUMPSUIT.  I've washed and dried it multiple times and it still feels brand new. The pockets hold my oversized phone + bulky case with no problem. The arm holes are high enough to cover your bra but not high enough to irritate your armpits. The mock neck doesn't choke you whatsoever. This jumpsuit made me feel good about my body for the first time in a long time, that's how flattering it is.  My only complaint is how short the zipper is. While you can get in and out of it just fine, trying to reach back and zip it is a bit of a pain, especially when you're in a rush. Despite this, I still have 3 more colors of this jumpsuit in my cart waiting for pay day lol.
Will be perfect for the business casual events i have planned.
